    • deserialize

      Deserializes the game object
      Returns:

    • setUI

      public void setUI(boolean val)
      Method to set the object as UI or not. If an object is UI, we don't have to render it, because it is being drawn specially.
      Parameters:
      val - true/false whether we want the object to be UI or not
